title: Hummus Trio
description: A selection of classic hummus, roasted red pepper hummus, and olive tapenade served with warm pita bread.

title: Greek Salad
description: Crisp lettuce, tomatoes, cucumbers, red onions, Kalamata olives, and feta cheese, tossed in a lemon-herb vinaigrette.

title: Falafel Platter
description: Crispy chickpea fritters served with tahini sauce, tabbouleh, and pickled vegetables.

title: Moussaka
description: Layers of eggplant, potato, and seasoned ground lamb, topped with b√©chamel sauce and baked to perfection.

title: Shawarma Plate
description: Slices of marinated chicken or beef, served with rice, grilled vegetables, and garlic sauce.

title: Seafood Paella
description: A flavorful rice dish cooked with a variety of seafood, saffron, tomatoes, and bell peppers.

title: Lamb Kebabs
description: Tender pieces of marinated lamb, grilled and served with rice pilaf and tzatziki sauce.

title: Spanakopita
description: Flaky phyllo pastry filled with spinach, feta cheese, and herbs.

title: Grilled Octopus
description: Tender octopus marinated in olive oil, garlic, and herbs, then grilled to perfection.

title: Chicken Souvlaki Pita
description: Grilled chicken skewers wrapped in a warm pita with lettuce, tomatoes, onions, and tzatziki sauce.

title: Baklava
description: Layers of phyllo pastry filled with chopped nuts and sweetened with honey syrup.

title: Tabbouleh Salad
description: A refreshing salad made with bulgur wheat, parsley, tomatoes, cucumbers, and mint, tossed in a lemon dressing.

title: Stuffed Grape Leaves
description: Grape leaves stuffed with a mixture of rice, pine nuts, currants, and spices, served with tzatziki sauce.

title: Lentil Soup
description: A hearty soup made with lentils, carrots, celery, onions, and spices.

title: Grilled Halloumi Cheese
description: Slices of halloumi cheese grilled until golden brown, served with a side of lemon wedges.

title: Lemon and Herb Roasted Chicken
description: Half a chicken marinated in lemon, garlic, and herbs, roasted until juicy and tender.

title: Mediterranean Mixed Grill
description: A selection of grilled meats, including chicken, lamb, and beef, served with rice pilaf and tzatziki sauce.

title: Feta and Olive Plate
description: A selection of feta cheese, mixed olives, and marinated vegetables, served with bread.

title: Mediterranean Pizza
description: Thin and crispy pizza crust topped with homemade tomato sauce, fresh mozzarella, Kalamata olives, cherry tomatoes, fresh basil leaves, and crumbled feta cheese.

title: Pizza Margherita
description: Delight in the classic flavors of Italy with our Margherita pizza. Topped with rich tomato sauce, creamy mozzarella cheese, fresh basil leaves, and a drizzle of olive oil.

title: Greek Coffee
description: Strong and rich Greek coffee served in a traditional briki pot.

title: Mastika
description: A traditional Greek liqueur made from mastic resin.

title: Greek Frappe
description: Iced coffee made with instant coffee, water, sugar, and milk.

title: Lemonade
description: Freshly squeezed lemonade with a hint of mint.

title: Herbal Tea
description: A variety of Greek herbal teas including chamomile and mountain tea.
